Game.Name: F1 Triple Battle (Japan)
Game.plot: Overview:F1 Triple Battle is a racing game for the PC Engine based on the open-wheel Formula One racing class. The screen is split three times horizontally and allows for up to three players to play simultaneously. When in single-player or two-player, the top part of the screen shows a map of the course. The game features a single-player World Championship mode, a training Test Run mode and the multiplayer Battle mode.Developed by Human Entertainment, they would later reproduce the same simultaneous three-player system for their 1994 Super Famicom racing game Human Grand Prix III: F1 Triple Battle.Cheat: Auto ModeAt the title screen, enter the Test Run menu. Now, highlight "Start", hold Left + II and press I. If done right, the computer will control the car.Cheat: Last Race PasswordAt the password screen, enter the following:Cheat: Last Race PasswordAt the password screen, place the cursor at the start of the last password row. Now, enter one of the following passwords:Cheat: Last Race PasswordAt the password screen, place the cursor at the start of the last password row. Now, enter "TESTA" and hit end. If done right, you'll get the sound test menu.
Game.Notes: Split screen Formula 1 style racing game. Compete against the computer or your friends.
